title: Discussing a viral internet video
context: Ask someone if they saw the short clip everyone is talking about.

content.bestLine: Did you see that crazy video everyone's talking about?

neutral.text: Have you seen the latest viral video?
I just saw a really popular video online
There's a new video going around that's really funny
Did you hear about the viral video that's trending?
I think you'd like this viral video I saw
Is that viral video real or fake?
What do you think about the latest viral video?
I just watched a viral video that's so cool

informal.text: Dude, have you seen that insane video?
OMG, you won't believe this video I just saw
I'm dying over here, have you seen that funny video?
What's up with that crazy video everyone's sharing?
You gotta see this viral video, it's hilarious
I'm obsessed with this one video that's going viral
Have you checked out that viral challenge video?
That viral video is everything and more

slang.text: Yaaas, have you seen that fire video?
Lowkey, that viral video is so extra
Highkey, I'm living for that viral video
No cap, that video is the most viral thing I've seen
I'm dead, that viral video is so lit
That viral video is a whole mood

patterns.meaning: asking if someone has seen a viral video
asking if someone has seen a specific type of viral content

dialogs.description: Two friends discussing a viral video

lines.speaker: Person A
lines.text: Did you see that crazy video everyone's talking about?

lines.speaker: Person B
lines.text: Yeah, I saw it yesterday! It's so funny

dialogs.description: Coworkers talking about a viral video at the office

lines.speaker: Coworker 1
lines.text: Have you seen the latest viral video?

lines.speaker: Coworker 2
lines.text: Not yet, but I've heard it's really popular
